| HistoryText             = The Idoidea Swarm Collective was an alien Pantheon.{{r|Incredible Hercules #118}}{{r|Incredible Hercules #119}}

Among its members was [[Ceffyad (Earth-616)|Ceffyad the Righteous]], who was said to stood for the highest aspirations and the noblest values of his world, and who battled and killed those unbelievers for the Idoidea Swarm Collective.{{r|Incredible Hercules #118}}

At some point, the [[Skrulls]] invaded the world of his worshippers, and Ceffyad was apparently killed, his head exposed as a trophy in the Skrull temple,{{r|Incredible Hercules #118}} and enslaved by the [[Skrull Pantheon (Earth-616)|Skrull Pantheon]].{{r|Incredible Hercules #119}} His alleged death was recorded into the [[Fractal Scriptures of Jemiah the Analyzer]].{{r|Incredible Hercules #118}}

When the [[God Squad (Earth-616)|"God Squad"]] came to the [[Skrull Dreamtime]] to stop the Skrull Gods, Ceffyad and his fellow defeated Gods attacked them. [[Ajak (Earth-616)|Ajak]] recognized him, understanding that the defeated Gods became absorbed to the Skrulls.{{r|Incredible Hercules #119}}

Ceffyad was seemingly killed by [[Amatsu-Mikaboshi (Earth-616)|Amatsu-Mikaboshi]],{{r|Incredible Hercules #119}} who soon took control of the absorbed Pantheons after the Skulls' defeat.{{r|Incredible Hercules #120}}
